panels.description: Shows how many nodes are running what version of Polymesh
panels.title: Node count by Polymesh version

panels.description: A healthy node should be able to process blocks soon after they are added to the import queue.  A node that has a growing number of blocks in the import queue is a node that is going to be lagging on the network.
panels.title: Blocks in import queue

panels.description: A healthy node should be able to process transactions soon after they are added to the ready queue.  A node that has a growing number of transactions in the ready queue is a node that is going to be lagging on the network.
panels.title: Transactions in ready queue

panels.description: All monitored Polymesh nodes should have a similar value for the target block.  A noticeable deviation is an indicator of the node having troubles or (in the case of new nodes) not being ready for operation.
panels.title: Target block

panels.description: All monitored Polymesh nodes should have a similar rate of block increase.  A noticeable deviation is an indicator of the node having troubles or (in the case of new nodes) not being ready for operation.
panels.title: Target block increase [1m]

panels.description: All monitored Polymesh nodes should have a similar value for the finalised block.  A noticeable deviation is an indicator of the node having troubles or (in the case of new nodes) not being ready for operation.
panels.title: Finalized block

panels.description: All monitored Polymesh nodes should have a similar rate of block increase.  A noticeable deviation is an indicator of the node having troubles or (in the case of new nodes) not being ready for operation.
panels.title: Finalized block increase [1m]

panels.description: All monitored Polymesh nodes should have a similar value for the best block.  A noticeable deviation is an indicator of the node having troubles or (in the case of new nodes) not being ready for operation.
panels.title: Best block

panels.description: All monitored Polymesh nodes should have a similar rate of block increase.  A noticeable deviation is an indicator of the node having troubles or (in the case of new nodes) not being ready for operation.
panels.title: Best block increase [1m]

panels.description: A new node that is not up to date with the chain will be syncing its blocks.  While a node is syncing it will not be performing its assigned function.  A healthy, up to date node will not be syncing the chain.
panels.title: Node is syncing the chain

panels.description: A healthy Polymesh chain should produce a block every six seconds on average.  Significant deviations from that number are an indicator of problems on the network.  The causes could be various - underspecced nodes, clock skew, DDoS, etc.
panels.title: Best block time [2m]

panels.description: Rate of rejected incoming connections due to the connection limit having been reached
panels.title: Incoming connection handshake - Limit reached [1m]

panels.description: Rate of rejected outgoing connections due to the connection limit having been reached
panels.title: Pending connections - Limit reached [1m]

panels.description: Rate of rejected incoming connections due to the peer having an invalid peerID
panels.title: Incoming connection handshake - Invalid peerID [1m]

panels.description: Rate of rejected outgoing connections due to the peer having an invalid peerID
panels.title: Pending connection - Invalid PeerID [1m]

panels.description: Rate of rejected incoming connections due to transport errors
panels.title: Incoming connection handshake - transport error [1m]

panels.description: Rate of rejected outgoing connections due to transport errors
panels.title: Pending connection - transport error [1m]

panels.description: A healthy edge node on the Polymesh network should  have a stable set of peers.  Churn on the peer connection rate should be unexpected, and may be an indicator of various network issues.
panels.title: Peer connections (in/out) [1m]

panels.description: If an operator node has zero peers then this needs to be addressed ASAP - an unconnected operator cannot produce blocks and will be slashed.
panels.title: Max peers [1m]
